bibl.title: Walt Whitman to an Unidentified Correspondent, [1876]
bibl.orgName: The location of the original manuscript is unknown.

revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

dateline.name: 431 Stevens Street Camden New Jersey / US America

body.p: Yours rec'dreceived—Many thanks—shall be happy to supply you with the Book—the best way is by mail—the price is £2 sent me here by p. o. order—it is entirely safe and easy—

postscript.p: Thanks for your offer of "the Poetry of the Period"—I have not seen it—
